languages.text: "Перед тем, как кто-нибудь заявит, что вскрывается, я, как хозяйка праздника, выдвигаю условие. Я буду играть только на танец".
"Before anyone says they're showing their hand — I'm announcing a condition, seeing as it's my ammaricar today: the only stake I'll play for is a dance."
languages.original_text: "Перед тем, как кто-нибудь заявит, что вскрывается, я, как хозяйка праздника, выдвигаю условие. Я буду играть только на танец".

traits.locale_text: "Before anyone says they're showing their hand — I'm announcing a condition, seeing as it's my ammaricar today: the only stake I'll play for is a dance."
"Before anyone says they're showing their hand — I'm announcing a condition, seeing as it's my ammaricar today: the only stake I'll play for is a dance."
"Before anyone says they're showing their hand — I'm announcing a condition, seeing as it's my ammaricar today: the only stake I'll play for is a dance."
"Before anyone says they're showing their hand — I'm announcing a condition, seeing as it's my ammaricar today: the only stake I'll play for is a dance."

languages.text: “既然今天是我的及冕礼，在所有人开牌之前，我要先宣布一个条件。我这局的赌注是跳一支舞。”
languages.original_text: "Before anyone says they're showing their hand — I'm announcing a condition, seeing as it's my ammaricar today: the only stake I'll play for is a dance."

traits.locale_text: “既然今天是我的及冕礼，在所有人开牌之前，我要先宣布一个条件。我这局的赌注是跳一支舞。”

languages.text: 「手札を見せると言われる前に言っておくけど…今日はあたしのアンマリカーだから条件を発表するよ。あたしが賭けるのは、ダンスだ」
languages.original_text: "Before anyone says they're showing their hand — I'm announcing a condition, seeing as it's my ammaricar today: the only stake I'll play for is a dance."

traits.locale_text: 「手札を見せると言われる前に言っておくけど…今日はあたしのアンマリカーだから条件を発表するよ。あたしが賭けるのは、ダンスだ」

languages.text: «Antes de que nadie muestre su mano, voy a anunciar una condición, ya que es mi ammaricar: lo único que apostaré será un baile».
languages.original_text: "Before anyone says they're showing their hand — I'm announcing a condition, seeing as it's my ammaricar today: the only stake I'll play for is a dance."

traits.locale_text: «Antes de que nadie muestre su mano, voy a anunciar una condición, ya que es mi ammaricar: lo único que apostaré será un baile».

languages.text: « Avant que quelqu'un ne pose sa main, permettez-moi d'annoncer une condition, puisqu'aujourd'hui, nous fêtons mon ammaricar : le seul enjeu qui m'intéresse, c'est une danse. »
languages.original_text: "Before anyone says they're showing their hand — I'm announcing a condition, seeing as it's my ammaricar today: the only stake I'll play for is a dance."

traits.locale_text: « Avant que quelqu'un ne pose sa main, permettez-moi d'annoncer une condition, puisqu'aujourd'hui, nous fêtons mon ammaricar : le seul enjeu qui m'intéresse, c'est une danse. »

languages.text: "Bevor jemand sagt, dass er seine Hand offenlegen will, führe ich eine neue Bedingung ein, da ja heute mein Ammaricar ist – ich spiele heute nur um einen Tanz."
languages.original_text: "Before anyone says they're showing their hand — I'm announcing a condition, seeing as it's my ammaricar today: the only stake I'll play for is a dance."

traits.locale_text: "Bevor jemand sagt, dass er seine Hand offenlegen will, führe ich eine neue Bedingung ein, da ja heute mein Ammaricar ist – ich spiele heute nur um einen Tanz."

languages.text: "Hazır kimse elini açacağını söylememişken... Madem bugün benim ammarikarım, bir şart koşuyorum: Yalnızca dansına oynarım."
languages.original_text: "Before anyone says they're showing their hand — I'm announcing a condition, seeing as it's my ammaricar today: the only stake I'll play for is a dance."

traits.locale_text: "Kimse elini açacağını söylemeden önce, madem bugün benim ammarikarım, bir şart koşuyorum: Karşılığında oynayacağım tek bahis bir dans."
